group_1.textLeft: Phew...we've defeated all the copies@around here...

group_1.textRight: So...how did you find this place?
We've been investigating as well.
We wanted to learn about what sort of opponent@a team of your caliber would struggle against...

group_1.textLeft: What, do ya mean you're stalkin' us?!

group_1.textRight: It's not like that, Ayame!
If your enemy's a Witch of Kamihama...
Then it could be a threat to our Union, too.
That's why we were investigating...!

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh, I get it...

group_1.textRight: And so, I apologize for my discourtesy, but...
I decided to investigate the movements of@your group and Sae Kirino yesterday.

group_1.textLeft: However...we hadn't expected to find@an offshoot Mirrors...

group_1.textRight: Though I did receive a hint.
"Nobody's going to run into it for a while,@even if we let it be."
"It's really good at hide-and-seek"...

group_1.textLeft: Well... Just a slip of the tongue, you could say.
But, why's Hotori and Maria here, too?

group_1.textRight: I...heard a rumor that your team might@stop being bodyguards...
I wanted to ask you to continue...

group_1.textLeft: Me, too... I was worried about your group@after hearing Konoha's words...
I went to see Mitama for advice.
And there, I happened to run into@Hotori and Nanaka.

group_1.textRight: At that time, I had discovered this Labyrinth@and the presence of your group.
Thus, I brought them all here.
I couldn't care less about this Punk-senpai,@though.

group_1.textLeft: Huuuh...?!
But you said you wanted to come with me...!

group_1.textRight: Hmph...
So, um, you see...
Everyone was worried about you...!

group_1.textLeft: Kako...
Thanks! But you don't gotta worry!
We decided to keep bein' buddyguards!

group_1.textRight: Really...?!

group_1.textLeft: You betcha!

group_1.textRight: It seems that my fears were unfounded...

group_1.textLeft: So, what's your goal here?

group_1.textRight: To explore the offshoot Mirrors.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, I'm sorry, but could I ask you to@stay back?

group_1.textRight: What are you saying...?

group_1.textLeft: We're here to fulfill Sae's request...to defeat@the Witch here.

group_1.textRight: Then let us help you!

group_1.textLeft: I appreciate the thought, but...this is something@the three of us need to settle on our own.
This is also for the sake of@restarting our activities...

group_1.textRight: ...Well, then, we shall simply explore@the offshoot Mirrors.

group_1.textLeft: Didn't you hear what we said?

group_1.textRight: Indeed, I was listening.
During our exploration, we shall remove copies@that get in our way, but...
Witches are quite dangerous, so we will not be@engaging them.
How does that sound?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
Me too, I'll help you in any way that I can.

group_1.textRight: But...the three of us have gotta do it, so...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... We can't ask you to help us@any more than you already have...
...Hazuki, Ayame...

group_1.textRight: What do you think, Konoha...?

group_1.textLeft: This...may sound conceited, but...
We're the reason they've all come here.
I think it's because we've been making@such an effort to change...

group_1.textRight: Effort... You mean our buddyguard work?
Ah...

group_1.textLeft: We've avoided getting involved with others.
But now there are all these Magical Girls who are@willing to help us...
I...want to believe that this is proof that@we've changed...
Thus...

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, I think I finally understand.
The meaning of our work is in our relationships@with other people...
Uhhh, what does that mean? What should we do?!

group_1.textLeft: ...We need everyone's help.

group_1.textRight: Then, Konoha...!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...
We ask you, once again, to please@lend us your help!
